biotools.summary: Package designed to facilitate power estimation for microbiome studies that will be analyzed with pairwise distances (beta diversity) and PERMANOVA (a non-parametric extension of multivariate analysis of variance to a matrix of pairwise distances).

bioschemas.name: micropower
